16: [{"page":"Input Management", "function":[{"function":"Select Excel File Input", "description":"Allow users to browse and select the 'Spring Semester Subjects.xlsx' file for processing."}, {"function":"View Subject List Preview", "description":"Display a preview of the initial subject list from the selected Excel file, including headers and example rows."}]}, {"page":"Data Transformation", "function":[{"function":"Convert Data to Two-Dimensional Table", "description":"Process the input data from the Excel file and restructure it into a two-dimensional table format, aligned with the provided header information."}, {"function":"Time Column Conversion", "description":"Handle the 'Time' column by transforming its unique options ('First period', 'Second period', 'Third period', 'Fourth period') into a standardized numerical representation for easier processing (e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4)."}, {"function":"Option to Modify Subject List", "description":"Provide an editor or visual interface to allow users to manually modify subject entries within the two-dimensional table before outputting to a new file."}]}, {"page":"Output Management", "function":[{"function":"Select Output File Name and Location", "description":"Enable users to specify the desired name and directory for the output Excel file containing the transformed subject list."}, {"function":"View Transformed Subject List", "description":"Display the final formatted subject list before saving it to the designated output excel file." }, {"function":"Save Transformed Subject List", "description":"Generate the new Excel file with the processed subject data."}]}]</json>
